description: Solicitation for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture under Product Category 6: Collaborative Support Space.
full_summary:
---

### Collaborative Furniture Tender

**Title**: Support Space – Collaborative Furniture
**Reference Number**: cb-562-91309423
**Solicitation Number**: 5000077253

**Publication Date**: January 25, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: February 7, 2024 at 11:00 AM (AST)
**Expected Contract Start/End Date**: February 16, 2024 - March 31, 2024

**Scope of Requirements**

Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking a supplier to provide collaborative furniture to its Edmonton, AB facility. The requirement is to procure, deliver, and install office furniture at 9250-49 Street, Edmonton, AB T6B 1K5 by March 31, 2024.

**Bidder Eligibility**
Bidder eligibility is open to all qualified suppliers who have a current registration with the Government of Canada's suppliers database and hold a valid approval certificate.

**Terms and Conditions**
Bidders must be prepared to comply with all applicable laws and regulations, including those related to provincial and federal tax obligations and commensurate record maintenance. Suppliers participating in this bid must also adhere to the government's ethical marketplace standards.

**Harmonized System**
This tender is in compliance with the Harmonized System 56101500, 56101532, and 56101700.

**IPD Interactive**: This bid has been shared on the Public Services and Procurement Canada website. Should you require any additional information, see the links to the tender description: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30453/5000077253_rfp-en.pdf and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30453/5000077253_rfp-fr.pdf
